text: Aur jo apney aap ko nasrani kehtay hain hum ney unn say bhi ehad-o-paymaan liya unhon ney bhi iss ka bara hissa faramosh ker diya jo unhen naseehat ki gaee thi to hum ney bhi unn kay aapas mein bughz-o-adawat daal di jo ta-qayamat rahey gi aur jo kuch yeh kertay thay un-qarib Allah Taalaa unhen sab bata dey ga
